title: Former Big Brother star Heidi Anderson reveals her post-baby body
text:
She first shot to fame as the outspoken radio host on the 2013 season of Big Brother.

And now, six years on from her time in the Big Brother house, Heidi has welcomed her first child, a son named Memphis.

In a recent social media post, the 35-year-old showed off her post-baby body and thanked her son for finally enabling her to accept her physique, flaws and all.

'THANK YOU for teaching me to LOVE my body in all its glory!' Former Big Brother star Heidi Anderson has proudly showcased her post-baby body on social media

Posing in her underwear, the former reality star wrote: 'To my dearest son Memphis.'

She continued: 'THANK YOU for teaching me to LOVE my body in all its glory! For years, I hated on myself & battled loving all my wobbly bits BUT something happened in pregnancy carrying you.

'I made a promise to teach you & show you what true love was. ⁣I promised to respect myself & honour my body & all it has endured.

'For years, I hated on myself & battled loving all my wobbly bits': The 35-year-old said that giving birth has taught her to love her body

'Never again, will I take my body for granted. Life is too short to waste years hating on it!'

She added: 'AND I promise to never waste another second beating myself up because of what I’ve eaten or what I look like. ⁣My beautiful pouch, will always be a reminder of YOU.'

Heidi and her husband James Griffiths welcomed little Memphis on September 5th.

Bundle of joy: Heidi and her husband James Griffiths welcomed little Memphis in September

Since then, the couple have been documenting every moment of parenthood on social media, with Heidi recently stating she loves sharing 'real mum' moments online with her fans.

The bubbly radio host was the sixth person evicted during Big Brother's 10th season in 2013.

Tim Dormer went on to win the season, while model and actress Jade Albany placed second.
